sentence: The image is a webpage from GameSpot, showcasing a game called "Heatseeker."
sentence_cn: 图片是 GameSpot 的一个网页，展示了一款名为“Heatseeker”的游戏。

sentence: - The top section features the GameSpot logo in yellow, along with navigation options for different platforms like PC, PS4, and Xbox One, among others.
sentence_cn: - 顶部部分以黄色显示 GameSpot 徽标，以及 PC、PS4 和 Xbox One 等不同平台的导航选项。

sentence: - Below the navigation, there is a search bar.
sentence_cn: - 导航下方有一个搜索栏。

sentence: - The main content focuses on "Heatseeker," which was first released on May 1, 2007, and is available on platforms like Wii, PSP, and PS2.
sentence_cn: - 主要内容集中在 2007 年 5 月 1 日首次发布并在 Wii、PSP 和 PS2 等平台上可用的“Heatseeker”。

sentence: There's an option to "Follow" the game.
sentence_cn: 有一个选项可以“关注”游戏。

sentence: - A cover art image of the game "Heatseeker" is visible on the left, showing a fighter jet and explosions.
sentence_cn: - 左侧是游戏“Heatseeker”的封面艺术图，其中显示了一架战斗机和爆炸场景。

sentence: - Next to the image, GameSpot has rated the game 5.7 out of 10, labeling it as "Mediocre."
sentence_cn: - 在图片旁边，GameSpot 对该游戏的评分为 5.7 分（满分 10 分），并将其标记为“平庸”。

sentence: Metacritic score is 62, and the user average rating is 7.2.
sentence_cn: Metacritic 评分为 62，用户平均评分为 7.2。

sentence: - Below this section, tabs are available for Reviews, News & Features, Images, Videos, Cheats & Guides, and Forum.
sentence_cn: - 在本节下方，标签可用于评论，新闻和功能，图像，视频，作弊和指南以及论坛。

sentence: - The "Latest on Heatseeker" section below lists updates, including articles about game releases dated May 28, 2007, and May 7-11.
sentence_cn: - 下面的“Heatseeker 最新消息”部分列出了更新内容，包括有关 2007 年 5 月 28 日和 5 月 7 日至 11 日发布的游戏的文章。

sentence: - The articles mention topics like "AU Shippin' Out May 28-June 1: Impossible Mission, Spidey, and ponies," and "Shippin' Out May 7-11: C&C3 360," with brief descriptions of their content.
sentence_cn: - 文章中提到了诸如“AU Shippin' Out 5 月 28 日至 6 月 1 日：不可能的任务、蜘蛛侠和小马”和“Shippin' Out 5 月 7 日至 11 日：C&C3 360”等主题，并简要描述了它们的内容。
words: AU Shippin' Out May 28-June 1: Impossible Mission, Spidey, and ponies,
